Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix test database isolation to use separate backtest_test database

- Add conftest.py with proper test fixtures that:
  - Use TEST_DATABASE_URL (postgresql://localhost/backtest_test)
  - Patch SessionLocal in all modules that import it directly
  - Wrap each test in a transaction that rolls back automatically
  
- Fix duplicate index definitions in database.py:
  - entry_time in TradeHistoryDB had both index=True and explicit Index
  - ticker/strategy_id in PendingEntryDB had duplicates
  - strategy_id in ActiveTradeDB had duplicates
  - order_id in OrderEventDB had duplicates

- Update test files to use database.SessionLocal() instead of direct
  imports to ensure patches are applied correctly

- Add TESTING_GUIDELINES.md with instructions for test database setup
